description: Minor Variation to remove the following conditions originally part of the old Public Entertainment Certificate or the old license and now covered by other legislation 110, 111, 116, 122, 127, 144, 145, 146, 147, 148, 149, 150, 151, 152, 153, 154, 155, 156, 157, 159, 160, 162, 163, 164, 165,166, 167, 168, 169, 170, 171, 172, 173, 174, 175, 176, 177, 178, 179, 180, 181, 182, 203.Alter condition 109 removing a and b, retain c and then remove the list of items not prohibited by c. Alter Condition 307 - the accommodation limit does not exceed 300 in total for the whole premises. This includes 100 Upstairs and 200 Downstairs. Not including staff. Annex 3 - change condition 791 to - that two SIA registered door supervisors will be engaged when the premises are in operation on Friday, Saturday and days preceding a bank holiday excluding Christmas eve and Christmas day. They will be employed at all times after 21:00hrs until the end of business and all patrons have vacated the premises. They will be engaged to monitor admission and re-admissions to the premises, security, protection, screening, dealing with conflict and ensure that conditions related to the use of the outside area are adhered to and that the dispersal policy for the premises is implemented.
